des:
Have you ever wished you could turn on the lights at night simply using your voice as the control? Life just got easier; just ask Alexa to help by saying a command.
When using the COLLINGWOOD application and Alexa, you will have the flexibility and convenience of voice control. It is easy to get started. Simply tap the “Link”button in the Alexa App to link your COLLINGWOOD account and say, “Alexa, discover devices”.
With the COLLINGWOOD smart home App, you can add a device, create lighting scenes or create custom room settings.

Add connected devices such as: smart wall dimmers, switches, bridges and gateways to take full control of your lighting. Effortlessly create custom mood or event scenes such as: Relax, Entertain, Dinner, Watch TV and so many more. Create Rooms for group control such as: Bedroom, Kitchen, Lounge, Dining room to name but a few.

After adding a new device, or creating a Scene or Room, simply ask echo, “discover devices” to have them work with the Alexa device. Here are some examples of voice control commands for your Collingwood smart home devices, in 3 simple steps. 
1. Discover device
2. Set
3. Use
Note: Currently the COLLINGWOOD Skill for Alexa can be used to control Collingwood switches, dimmers, bridges and gateways. For more compatible devices please visit www.collingwoodlighting.com or contact Collingwood.
